author: Hugh Jeffreys
description:
Part of the reason older IOS devices no longer receive App updates and lose the ability to download new apps is because of a few 13MB files removed from App developers which would allow them to push apps to these versions.

title: Apple’s Preventing Apps From Working On Older iPhones & This Is How They're Doing It #AppGate
